QuestData.Title: The Jailer's Grasp
QuestData.Description:
By peering into the Maw, Bolvar drew the Jailer's attention.
His worst fears have come to pass.
You must help me break the link, $n! The fragment of the Helm is the key!
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Jaina Proudmoore sever the Jailer's connection to Bolvar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Oribos.
